message: Let's start with a fair split. You get 10% and I get 90%, but the money is worth less in the next round.  Think about it!
You got 90% in the first round, now it's my turn to take the majority!
I know you want the majority, but let's be reasonable. We both lose money with each round.  This offer is a fair compromise, and we can both walk away with a decent amount.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think I deserve more after your last offer was even more skewed towards you.
This is the last round before the money becomes practically worthless. Let's be fair and split it evenly. It's the best option for both of us.
